description: Updates an existing Amazon Q Business application.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application.

parameters.name: attachmentsConfiguration
parameters.description: An option to allow end users to upload files directly during chat. Status information about whether file upload functionality is activated or deactivated for your end user.

nested_params.name: attachmentsControlMode
nested_params.description: Status information about whether file upload functionality is activated or deactivated for your end user.

parameters.name: qAppsConfiguration
parameters.description: An option to allow end users to create and use Amazon Q Apps in the web experience. Status information about whether end users can create and use Amazon Q Apps in the web experience.

nested_params.name: qAppsControlMode
nested_params.description: Status information about whether end users can create and use Amazon Q Apps in the web experience.

parameters.name: personalizationConfiguration
parameters.description: Configuration information about chat response personalization. For more information, see Personalizing chat responses. An option to allow Amazon Q Business to customize chat responses using user specific metadata--specifically, location and job information--in your IAM Identity Center instance.

nested_params.name: personalizationControlMode
nested_params.description: An option to allow Amazon Q Business to customize chat responses using user specific metadata--specifically, location and job information--in your IAM Identity Center instance.

parameters.name: autoSubscriptionConfiguration
parameters.description: An option to enable updating the default subscription type assigned to an Amazon Q Business application using IAM identity federation for user management. Describes whether automatic subscriptions are enabled for an Amazon Q Business application using IAM identity federation for user management. defaultSubscriptionType (string) --- Describes the default subscription type assigned to an Amazon Q Business application using IAM identity federation for user management. If the value for autoSubscribe is set to ENABLED you must select a value for this field.

nested_params.name: autoSubscribe
nested_params.description: Describes whether automatic subscriptions are enabled for an Amazon Q Business application using IAM identity federation for user management.

nested_params.name: defaultSubscriptionType
nested_params.description: Describes the default subscription type assigned to an Amazon Q Business application using IAM identity federation for user management. If the value for autoSubscribe is set to ENABLED you must select a value for this field.
